Chan Thoeun (pictured here with her loom) has been married to her new husband since just 2010. She has two young children - one son and one daughter. She lives with her father, who sells cows on an island on the Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia.

Chan Thoeun is a weaver, while her husband is a security guard. She is asking for a loan of $1,500 to buy weaving materials for her weaving business. She will also use a part of the loan to help provide capital for her father by purchasing additional cows for resale.

loans.use: to buy weaving materials for her weaving business and to purchase additional cows for resale

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro tiene 46 años, vive con sus 2 hijos: Judith y Luis, a los que cuida en una casa propia en la localidad de Yapaz Bajo, distrito de San Luis de Shuaro – Chanchamayo. Alejandro es un padre ejemplar. Tiene que hacerse cargo de la responsabilidad solo, ya que la madre de sus hijos, los dejó. Alejandro se siente feliz de dedicar su vida a la agricultura, principal actividad económica de su familia. Desde hace 10 años trabaja como peón en diferentes cultivos de café y plátanos; donde le pagan un promedio de S/. 600 nuevos soles semanales por cultivar, machetear y mantener limpio los sembríos. “No pude obtener mis propios terrenos ya que tenía que invertir todas mis ganancias en mantener a mis hijos”, menciona con mucha nostalgia y a la vez orgullo. Además de compartir su tiempo en el negocio de compra y venta de frutas en el mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Huancayo, donde viaja una vez al mes, obteniendo buenas ganancias. Ahora su objetivo principal es poder brindarles a sus hijos una buena educación, para ello trabajará como lo hace hasta ahora. Éste sería su crédito número 3 que recibiría de MFP, para continuar con la lucha por sus objetivos. Se compromete una vez más en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal “El Palomar al Éxito” porque todos sus integrantes son personas muy solidarias.
Alejandro de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en continuar con la construcción de su casa, además adquirirá bolsas de abonos para sus cultivos de café.
texts.en:
Alejandro, 46, lives with his two children, Judith and Luis, who he cares for in his own house, located Yapaz Bajo, San Luis de Shuaro-Chanchamayo District. 

Alejandro is an exemplary father.  He has to take total responsibility since the mother of his children abandoned them.  Alejandro feels happy to dedicate his life to agriculture, his family’s main economic activity.  He’s worked for the last ten years as a day laborer in various coffee and banana plantations where he earns on average 600 new soles weekly to cultivate, fell with machete and weed the crops.  “I wasn’t able to acquire farmland of my own because I had to invest all my earnings in supporting my children,” he states both with nostalgia and pride at the same time.  He also is a fruit vendor in the city of Huancayo’s wholesale market where he travels to once a month earning good profits.  His main objective now is to provide a good education for his children and will work towards that like he’s been doing to date.

This would be loan #3 he’d get from MFP to continue striving toward his goals.  He commits once more to make his installment payments.  He enjoys being part of his ‘EL Palomar al Éxito” (El Palomar to Success) communal bank because all the members are very mutually supportive people.

If Alejandro were to receive your support he will use the requested money to continue building his house and will also buy sacks of organic manure for his coffee crops.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure and supplies to finish building his house.

loans.name: Sokheang

texts.en:
Sokheang (in the photo) and her husband, Pon, are farmers. When it is not farming season, Sokheang weaves at home. The couple has been married since 1982 and they have four sons and five daughters. Four are married, three are garment workers, and the other two attend school. They live on an island off the Mekong River, about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Sokheang is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,500 to purchase a tuk tuk for her son to launch a tuk tuk-driving business.

loans.use: to purchase a tuk tuk for her son to launch a tuk tuk-driving business

loans.name: Ivan

texts.es:
Iván de 34 años convive con Olinda, con quien tiene 2 hijos de 13 y 11 años. Todos ellos viven en una casa propia en la localidad de Sanchirio Palomar, distrito de San Luis de Shuaro – Chanchamayo. Iván se dedica a la agricultura. Desde niño aprendió sobre las arduas labores del campo. En sus parcelas propias de terrenos siembra café y plátanos. Con estos 2 productos puede darle a su familia el sustento necesario para satisfacer sus necesidades básicas. Gracias a sus ahorros logró abrir un negocio de venta de abarrotes, para ello instaló una tienda en su hogar. 
Iván es un hombre trabajador. Cuando termina sus tareas en el campo, labora como albañil. Y como si fuera poco también se dedica a la venta de combustible. Compra varios galones de petróleo y gasolina y los expende a pobladores de su zona. De esa manera puede estar seguro que la economía de su familia está asegurada. 
Una de sus metas es adquirir más terrenos de cultivos, ya que la siembra de café le trae buenos resultados. Éste sería crédito número 5 que Iván obtendría de MFP, por eso se compromete en ser puntual en el pago de las cuotas mensuales. Pertenece al banco comunal “El Palomar al Éxito”, del que se siente contento por tener compañeros responsables. Invertirá el dinero de su préstamo en la compra de galones de combustible para su negocio. Además comprará bolsas de abonos orgánicos para su cafetal.
texts.en:
Iván, 34, lives with Olinda with whom he has two children who are 13 and 11 years old.  They all live together in their own house locate din Sanchirio Palomar, San Luis de Shuaro-Chanchamayo District.  Iván is a farmer.  He learned to do the hard field work when he was a boy.  He grows coffee and bananas on his own land.  With these two products he’s able to give his family the necessary sustenance to meet their basic needs.  Thanks to his savings he was able to open a grocery store at home.

Iván is a hardworking man.  When he finishes his work in the fields he works as a bricklayer.  And as if this weren’t enough, he also sells fuel.  He buys various gallons of petroleum and gasoline and sells them to residents in his zone.  This way he’s sure his family’s economy is insured.  One of his goals is to acquire more farmland because coffee growing brings good results.  

This would be loan #5 Iván would get from MFP so he commits to be punctual with his monthly installment payments.  He belongs to the “El Palomar al Éxito” (El Palomar to Success) communal bank and he feels happy to do so because he has responsible fellow members.  He will invest the money from his loan purchasing gallons of fuel for his business and he will also buy sacks of organic manure for his coffee plants.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure and gallons of fuel.

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma, de 32 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Juan de  35 años y sus 03 estimados hijos a quienes brinda un apoyo incondicional. Las producciones que con tanto esmero y dedicación  han logrado sembrar  Vilma  y su pareja, le han ayudado mucho en el progreso de su vida.  Desde muy temprano empieza a laborar en sus tierras, ya que sabe que del cuidado que le brinde a sus sembríos de café, dependerá la calidad de los productos que obtenga.  Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es cuidar sus cultivos y se siente muy contenta cuando ve un buena producción. Hace  más de 15  años que se dedica al cultivo de plantas de café; sin embargo  considera difícil llevar lo cosechado hasta los centros de acopio ubicada en su localidad, lugar donde recibe mejores precios por sus productos, con el crédito solicitado podrá contratar a jornaleros para que le brinden el apoyo en el mantenimiento de sus plantas. Para más adelante, espera sembrar más plantas de café. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP; y sabe que su compromiso es pagar puntual sus cuotas. En su banco comunal es una socia muy solidaria. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café  para que incremente es su parcela y con el resto contratará peones que puedan ayudarle a sembrarlo.
texts.en: Vilma is 32 years old and lives in a home of her own, along with her partner, 35 year old Juan, and their three lovely children to whom she provides unconditional support.  The crops that Vilma and her partner have managed with great enthusiasm, have greatly helped them make progress in their lives.  She begins working her land very early in the morning, because she knows that the care she gives to her coffee crop will determine the quality of the product she will obtain.  What she enjoys most about the work is caring for her crop and she feels happy to have a good production.  She’s been growing coffee for more than 15 years, however she considers taking the harvest to supply centers in the area to be very difficult, but this is where she gets the best prices for her products.  This loan will allow her to hire laborers who will care for her plants.  In the future she hopes to be able to plant more coffee plants.   This will be her second loan through MFP and she knows that her responsibility is to make her payments on time.  She is a loyal member of her communal bank.  She will use the 1,000 PEN to buy coffee plants so that she can increase production on her land.  She will use the rest to hire field hands to help her plant them.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants and hire field hands.

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en:
Francisca, 47 years old, is married with five grown-up children and lives with her family in the village of Benito Soliven. Francisca and her spouse are engaged in fishing to maintain the daily needs of her family. Every day her spouse goes to the river to go fishing and in the afternoon they will fish fetch. Francisca sells the fish in the village. 

Francisca is requesting the amount of PHP 10,000 to buy materials to improve her boat so that they can catch more fish to sell and to be more convenient for catching fish in the river.

In the future, Francisca hopes that her business expands to provide for the needs of her family.

loans.use: to buy materials for her boat

loans.name: Maurita

texts.es: Maurita, de 34 años, es una mujer hacendosa y empeñosa; vive en su propia casa junto a sus 02 queridas hijas Alexandra de 14 y Daleska de 10 años, a quienes desea ofrecer una mejor calidad de vida. La actividad que realiza la señora Maurita, es vender materiales de escritorio como por ejemplo: libros, cuadernos, lapiceros, colores, plumones, entre otros. Esta actividad lleva realizando hace mas de 11 años y considera que es rentable porque siempre esta vendiendo y le ayuda con los gastos de su hogar; por la buena atención de ella, los clientes van muy seguido a su negocio ya que pueden encontrar las mejores marcas de sus productos. Con el tiempo desea en que su tienda se haga una librería muy grande en la que no pueda faltarle nada. Ahora lo mas prioriza es poder comprar lo necesario para su tienda porque quiere estar preparada para los inicios de clases; gracias a las ganancias de  su negocio puede ofrecer una buena estadía a sus pequeñas hijas. Este será su crédito número 13 con MFP, se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con los pagos de sus cuotas como en anteriores créditos. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque sus integrantes son personas muy responsables. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles comprará abastecimientos para su negocio ya que se viene la campaña escolar.
texts.en:
Maurita, 34 years old, is an industrious and hard-working woman. She lives in her own house with her two beloved daughters: Alexandra, 14 years old, and Daleska, 10 years old. She wants to offer them a better quality of life. 

Maurita is in the business of selling office materials such as books, notebooks, ballpoint pens, crayons and felt-tip pens, among others. She has been doing this for more than 11 years and she considers it profitable because she is always selling. This helps her with the household expenses. Since Maurita offers a good customer service, the customers come back very often at her shop, as they can find the best brands of her items. With time, she wishes that her shop becomes a very large bookstore, where nothing is missing. Now she mostly prioritize being able to buy the needed supplies for her shop, because she wants to be ready for the school's start. Thanks to her shop's profits, Maurita can offer a good stay to her young daughters. 

This will be her 13th loan received from MFP. She commits, one more time, to fulfill the payment for her installments, as she did with the previous loans. She is also pleased to be a member of her communal bank, as its members are very responsible people. 

With the new money she will buy supplies for her shop, as the school campaign is coming soon.

loans.use: To buy merchandise such as school supplied for the school campaign

loans.name: Willen

texts.en: Willen is a very young married woman. She is 25 years old and has one child. She engaged in selling different fish in her village. Willen hopes that someday her business expands so that she can build a house for her family. For this, Willen is asking for a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy a variety of fish to sell.

loans.use: to buy fish for her business

loans.name: Sarak

texts.en:
Sarak (in the photo) and her husband, Sokhon, are garment workers. In the past, Sarak’s husband was a bicycle and motorbike repairman. But, his business struggled a bit because his customers were paying for their repairing fees through credit, which caused him to not be able to manage the income to operate his business. Facing this, he decided to quit his business. 

The couple has been married since 2007 and they have two sons - one attends school and the other is still young. They live in a village about twenty kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Sarak is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to purchase a motorcycle to get to work.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to get to work

loans.name: Richard

texts.es:
Richard, de 23 años de edad, es un joven alegre y trabajador; vive en la casa que le fue cedida por sus padres. Richard es un hombre de provecho su actividad es brindar la movilización a sus pasajeros que van a diferentes anexos de su localidad. Él es un joven que  ofrece muy buena atención, como  por ejemplo cuando los agricultores están con sus sacos de cosecha pues les ayuda a cargarlos en su carro y les lleva hasta los centros de comercialización; lleva 02 años realizando esta labor y para él es lo mas sencillo que puede hacer como también le gusta ayudar a sus paisanos agricultores. Con el tiempo desea en comprar otro carro para poder seguir trabajando en lo que mas le gusta. Richard comenta que gracias a la labor que realiza pues puede solventar con sus propios gastos ya que siempre esta transitando a diferentes lugares. Lo que ahora prioriza es poder arreglar su carro actual donde a estado trabajando durante estos dos años y le a ayudado en tener una buena estadía.  Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP; y se siente contento de saber que contará con el apoyo financiero para que pueda concretar sus planes. En su banco comunal es un socio activo y cabal.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará los repuestos necesarios para mejorar su carro como por ejemplo: rotula, parabrisas y espejos.
texts.en:
Richard is 23 years old and is a happy and hard-working young man.  He lives in the house he was given by his parents.  Richard is a man who likes to work and his activity is to give mobility to his passengers who go to different parts of his town.  He is a young man who offers very good service.  For example, when the farmers have their bags full of harvest he helps them to carry them in his car and he takes them to the trade centers.  He has been doing this work for two years and for him it is the simplest thing he can do and he also likes helping his fellow farmers.

In time he wants to buy another car in order to continue working at what he enjoys.  Richard says that thanks to the work that he does he can pay his own expenses since he is always going to different places.

His priority now is to fix his current car that he has been working with for the past two years and that has helped him have a good period.  This will be his second credit with MFP, and he is happy to know that he can count on the financial help in order to realize his plans.

He is an active and upstanding member of his communal bank.  With the 1,000 nuevos soles, he will buy the replacement parts necessary to improve his car, for example a ball and socket joint, windshield and mirrors.

loans.use: to buy a ball-and-socket joint, windshield and mirrors.

loans.name: Lidia

texts.es:
Lidia, de 51 años, es una mujer viuda y vive en su propia casa junto a sus dos queridos hijos Abraham de 23 años y Luz de 15 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Lidia, es una mujer alegre, se preocupa por el bienestar de su familia. Hace 35 años que se dedica al labrar la tierra y a sembrar plantas de cacao y café. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros quienes le ayudan a extraer los frutos de manera rápida. Para después llevarlas a vender a los centros de acopio de su localidad, donde se hallan lo centros de acopio que le remuneran buenas ganancias por cada peso de café. Con el tiempo desea en comprar mas plantas de cacao y café para sembrar en su parcela que prioriza en comprarlas. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP; sabe que tiene que ser puntual con las cuotas de pago para que en otra oportunidad pueda acceder a otra solicitud de préstamo. En su banco comunal es una socia muy activa y responsable.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará una hectárea de terreno para sembrar mas plantas de las que ya tiene.
texts.en:
Lidia is 51 years old, is widowed, and lives in a home of her own, along with her two loving children, 23 year old Abraham and 15 year old Luz.  She wants to provide them with a better quality of life.  Lidia is a happy lady who is concerned about her family’s wellbeing.  She‘s been working the land and planting coffee and cacao for 35 years.  During harvest season she hires field hands in order to speed up the harvest.  Later she takes the coffee to the local supply centers, where the centers where she gets the best prices for coffee by weight are found.  In time she wants to buy more coffee and cacao plants to plant on her land.  This is a priority for her.  This will be her fifth loan through MFP.  She knows that she must make her payments on time so that she will have another opportunity to obtain a loan.  She is very active and responsible in her communal bank.

She will use the 1,000 PEN to buy a hectare of land to plant the plant she has.

loans.use: to buy farmland.

loans.name: Marilette Joy

texts.en:
Marilette Joy is a multi-tasking woman who has three different businesses. She has a motorcycle used by her husband as a source of income. She is also in the hog-fattening business and has a sari-sari store. She does these businesses for the sake of her child for readying for his future. She has been in these businesses for more than a year. She wants to expand and earn a higher income. 

This causes Marilette Joy to request a loan of PHP 50,000 to use in purchasing piglets, grocery items, and to use as maintenance for her motorcycle that is used by her husband. It would then provide their customers with comfortable transportation. With their untiring work, she knows that someday, they will feel contentment and a relaxed lifestyle, accompanied by the belief in God.

loans.use: to purchase piglets, grocery items, and to use as maintenance for her motorcycle

loans.name: Ouindinmanegde Group

texts.fr:
Mme BINTA  est la représentante du groupe OUINDINMANEGDE. Elle est mariée  et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 10ans et le moins âgé a 02ans.02  vont à l’école. Elle a 03 personnes en charge.

Elle vend des  plats en plastique (gobelets, sceaux, plats, bouillards etc.) depuis  03ans. Elle s’approvisionne  au marché de sankariyaaré en ville .Ses clients sont  les femmes et les hommes.

Elle veut  s’acheter  01 douzaine de bouillard, 01 douzaine de  gobelets, 02 fûts, des  sceaux et des bols.

 Elle épargne  ses bénéfices pour s’acheter un motocycle. Elle ambitionne  ouvrir une grande boutique.
texts.en:
Binta is the representative of the Ouindinmanegde group. She is married and the mother of three children, two of whom attend school. The oldest is 10 years old and the youngest is two, so she has three dependents. For the past three years, she has been selling kitchenware (cups, buckets, dishes, kettles, etc.). She buys her supplies at the sankariyaaré market in town. Her customers are both women and men. 

She wants to buy one dozen kettles, one dozen cups, two barrels, and some buckets and bowls. 

She is saving her profits to buy a motorcycle. She aims to open a large store.

loans.use: to purchase 1 dozen kettles, 1 dozen cups, 2 barrels, some buckets and bowls.

loans.name: Sokhen

texts.en:
Sokhen, age 31, is a garment worker, while her husband, Vuthy, age 37, has full-time employment. They have been married since 2007 and have two sons, the eldest of whom attends school. They live in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Because of the costs involved in frequently repairing their old motorbike, Sokhen is requesting a loan of $500 to add to her own money to buy a new motorbike for her husband to commute to work.

loans.use: to buy a new motorbike for her husband to commute to work.

loans.name: Ylaria

texts.es: Ylaria, de 28 años, una mujer laboriosa, vive en su propia casa junto a sus dos queridos hijos Franklin de 09 años y Netsy de 04 años a quienes desea dar una mejor calidad de vida. Ylaria,  es una mujer que pone mucho empeño a la actividad que realiza; ella  se dedica a ver sus plantas de cacao que llegó ha sembrar hace mas de 08  años y ahora se encarga de  las cosechas que cada temporada cumple  con llegar a colectar. Ylaria, en tiempos de coger los granos de café, lo hace con la ayuda de jornaleros quienes apoyan para que pueda extraer rápido los frutos. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder tener buena producción y llevarla a vender a buenos precios que faciliten sus gastos y considera difícil el tener que llevar a los centros de acopio que se encuentran a media hora de su localidad; ahora lo primordial es incrementar mas plantas de café para que le ayuden a mejorar su calidad de vida ya que se gana muy bien vendiendo cada kilo de café. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP; esta muy contenta de saber que contará con el apoyo de los financistas. En su banco comunal es una mujer solidaria y responsable. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café injertadas ya que son muy buenas en su producción.
texts.en:
Ylaria, 28 years old, is a hard-working woman.  She lives in her own house with her two beloved children, Franklin, 9, and Netsy, 4.  She hopes to give them a better quality of life.  Ylaria is a woman who puts a lot of effort into the the work that she does.  She cares for her cacao plants that she planted more than eight years ago and she takes charge of the harvests that come every season.

During the times when she collects the coffee beans, Ylaria works with the help of day laborers who help so that she can rapidly extract the fruits.  What she likes best about her work it to be able to have good production and to take it to sell at good prices that can facilitate her expenses.  She finds it difficult to have to take the harvest to the gathering place which is a half hour from her town.

Currently the most important thing is to increase the number of coffee plants so that they can help her to improve her quality of life since she earns very well selling each kilo of coffee.  

This will be her third loan with MFP.  She is very happy to know that she can count on the help of the lenders.  She is a very responsible and supportive woman in her communal bank.  With the 1,000 nuevos soles, she will buy grafted coffee plants since they produce very well.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants.

loans.name: Yudy

texts.es:
Yudy, de 28años, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Rigoberto de 31 años y su querido  hijo  Juan de 06 años a quien desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Yudy, es una mujer afanosa, se dedica al cuidado de su hijo como también labora en sus campos de cultivo donde produce plantas de café y cacao. Hace 10 años que empezó con su trabajo y considera que lo más difícil es no poder combatir con las plagas y malezas que afectan sus labranzas; pero aun así ella persiste con su faena ya que es la manera de poder enmendar con los gastos de su hogar. Yudy  y su cónyuge se preocupan por la educación de su procedente y desde muy temprano se dirigen a su parcela para que en los tiempos de cosecha obtenga buena producción. Desde que sus cercanos le hablaron sobre los préstamos de MFP no dudo en acoplarse para seguir con sus planes de trabajo y seguir trabajando con mucho esmero de esa manera lograría tener una buena estadía. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP; se compromete a pagar puntual sus cuotas de pago para que en otra oportunidad pueda acceder a otro crédito. En su banco comunal es una socia responsable.
Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprará abono para mantener su producción de café y cacao.
texts.en:
Yudy, 28 years old, lives in her own house together with her partner, Rigoberto, who is 31 years old, and her dear son Juan, who is 6 years old and whom she wants to give a better quality of life. Yudy is an industrious woman, who takes care of her son and also works in the fields which produce coffee and cocoa. She began this work 10 years ago and what she considers to be the most difficult thing is not being able to overcome the pests and the weeds that affect her crops; but even so she persists with her chores as this is the way to be able to put the household expenses in order. 

Yudy and her husband, through their training, are appropriately concerned and arrive early in their field during harvest time in order to obtain a good production. Her neighbors spoke to her about their loans obtained through MFP, and she didn’t hesitate to link up with them in order to continue with her work plans and to continue working with great care and in this way accomplishing being in a good position.

This will be her second loan with MFP and she promises to make her payments punctually so that on another occasion she can request another loan. She is a trustworthy member of her communal bank. With the 1,000 soles she will buy fertilizer to  maintain her coffee and cocoa production.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Francisca

texts.en: Francisca, 46 years old, is married with four school-aged children. Francisca is a very responsible mother; she does everything that she can do to sustain the needs of her family. Francisca sells a variety of products to the people in the community. Francisca is asking for a loan of PHP 10,000 to buy different products to offer in the community. She hopes that she can see her children growing up and finishing their studies.

loans.use: to buy noodles, coffee, vinegar, and snack foods to sell

loans.name: Syphos

texts.en:
Syphos (in the photo) is 44 years old and her husband, Sophon, is 54 years old. They live in a suburb of Phnom Penh. They have been married since 1987 and have three children - one son and two daughters. One child has full-time employment, another one is in university, and the other one is in high school.

Syphos stays at home and raises cows, while her husband is a soldier. She wants to launch a business - buying and reselling rice. So, she is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,000 to help her capital. She will also use part of the loan to make a stairway in her house and to pay the school fees for her daughter, who is in her second year of banking university.

loans.use: to purchase rice for resale

loans.name: Elena

texts.en: This is a very diligent and responsible mother who is engaged in selling bread in different areas of Benito province of Isabela. Elena is 42 years old and married to Francisco. They both help each other to deliver bread to sustain the needs of their family. With that, Elena is asking for a loan of PHP 12,000 to buy ingredients like flour, sugar, and yeast for her business. Elena hopes that her business expands so that she can give the quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to purchase flour, yeast, and sugar for her business

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth, a hardworking 47-year-old woman who is always looking for the welfare of her family, helps her husband in providing for their household expenses. She is a dealer of rice in the market, a business that enables her to send her one child to school.

In order to increase her sales, Elizabeth wants to increase the variety of rice she offers for sale and so is requesting a loan of P50,000 to buy kan darak and sinandomeng rice, both of which are sought by her customers. Elizabeth is confident that this loan will help her expand her business and lead to an improved lifestyle.

loans.use: to buy kan darak and sinandomeng rice.

loans.name: Placide

texts.fr:
Monsieur Placide est motard. Il est marié, âgé de 38 ans et a 4 entants dont le plus âgé a 9 ans et le moins âgé a 3 ans. 3 de ses enfants vont à l'école et n'a aucune autre personne en charge. Son niveau d'éducation est 6 ans de l'école secondaire.

Ayant debuté dans l'ACB en 2005, Monsieur Placide est au 12ème cycle. Tous les crédits qu'il a soldé dans le passé sont bien remboursé. Le crédit lui octroyé lui a permit d'acheter l'assurance de ses motos, de payer l'autorisation de transport ainsi que les taxes. Il n'anticipe aucune difficulté qui pourra provoquer le non remboursement de son crédit.

Il a la stratégie de travailler beaucoup pour arriver à un niveau d'acheter une voiture. Le profit qu'il tire dans son activité de motard lui permet de mettre sa famille en bon état.
texts.en:
Placide is a motorcyclist. He is married, 38 years old and he has 4 children - the eldest is 9 years old, and the youngest 3. Three of his children attend school and he has no other dependents. He completed 6 years of secondary education. Having started with the ACB in 2005, this will be Placide's 12th loan. All the loans he has previously taken out have been repaid.
The loan accorded to him this time has allowed him to buy motorcycle insurance, to pay the transport permit and the taxes. He does not anticipate any difficulty which could result in him failing to repay the loan. His plan is to work hard in order to be able to buy a car. The profit he generates as a motorcyclist allow him to take good care of his family.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle insurance, a transport permit and to pay taxes.

loans.name: Pelegrina

texts.en:
Pelegrina is 42 years old and married with two school-aged children. Pelegrina has managed a hog raising business for two years.

Pelegrina is a very patient person to her family. She is asking for a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy feed and piglets to have additional income so that she can meet the needs of her children.

loans.use: to buy feed and piglets for her business

loans.name: Elise

texts.fr:
Madame Elise est une des anciennes sociétaires de l’IMCEC. Elle a eu à bénéficier de ses services au temps ou elle faisait du commerce. Elle veut réactiver son ancienne profession qu’est la couture dans laquelle elle a acquis une expérience de 8 ans. Elle l’avait arrêté à cause de ses responsabilités familiales, maintenant que ses enfants ont grandi, elle a décidé  de s’y dévouer entièrement. Pour cela, elle sollicite l’appui de la caisse pour pouvoir y arriver.
Avec le crédit, elle va réfectionner l’atelier qu’elle a ouvert il y a 2 ans de cela : acheter des vitres pour le design, refaire la peinture. Avec le reste, elle va acheter des tissus, les confectionner et les exposer pour vente.
Elle a comme charge, le payement de la location de son atelier.
Dans l’avenir, elle voudrait ouvrir un autre local dans le but de diversifier  les produits et services.
texts.en:
Madame Elise is one of the long-standing members of IMCEC. She benefited from these services when she was in business. She wants to get back into her old job as a seamstress. She has eight years experience in this line of work. She had to stop because of family responsibilities; but now that her children have grown, she has decided to go back to work full time. Therefore, she is requesting the support of the credit association in order to get back into her work. With this loan, she will revitalize the workshop that she opened two years ago by buying windows and repainting. With the rest of the loan, she will buy fabric, sew it, and sell it.
One of her costs is the payment for her workshop space.
In the future, she would like to open another workshop with the goal of diversifying her products and services.

loans.use: to buy fabric to sew and sell, and to revitalize her workshop.

loans.name: Julia

texts.es:
Julia, es una mujer con mucha paciencia, a sus 33 años, tiene su casa de madera  muy acogedor.  En ella vive con su esposo y sus 04 hijos. Lo que más le gusta hacer a la señora Julia es  remover la tierra para después cultivar plantas de cacao, cuya actividad que sabe hacer bien,  todos los días de la semana sobre todo por las mañanas después  de preparar el desayuno se dirige a sus campos de cultivo.    Lleva aproximadamente 30 años de comercializar los frutos de cacao a los centros de acopio de su localidad, este trabajo lo hace con la ayuda de su esposo y de sus hijos quienes se esmeran por salir adelante. Ella se siente contenta con lo que hace agradece a sus padres por haberle enseñado ya que ahora es su  soporte económico. Por otra parte su mayor anhelo es poder construir su casa de material noble. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP; y su deber es seguir siendo  un cliente muy responsable, ya que le gustaría seguir contando con posteriores créditos. Asimismo  se siente muy bien con sus compañeras de crédito al que les tiene mucha estima.
Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará cemento, arena, fierros y lo necesario para avanzar con la construcción de su casa.
texts.en:
Julia, is a very patient woman, who at 33 years old has a cozy, wood house where she lives with her husband and 4 children. What Julia likes to do most is dig up the land to plant cacao, an activity which she knows well. Every morning of the week, after making breakfast, she heads to her crop fields. For 30 years, she has been selling cacao pods to the warehouses in her area. She works with her husband and children, who are all trying hard to get ahead. 

She is happy with her work and grateful to her parents for having taught her because it is now her source of income. On the other hand, her great wish is to build a house of decent materials. This will be her 3rd loan cycle with MFP. Her obligation is to continue being a responsible client because she would like to count on future loans. She also gets along with the other loan members, whom she admires a lot.

With 3,000 nuevos soles, she will purchase cement, sand, iron rods, and other necessary supplies to move forward with the construction of her house.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, and iron rods.

loans.name: Bun

texts.en:
Bun is 54 years old and her husband, Trey, is 54 years old. They live on an island in the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh. They have been married since 1981 and they have six children: two sons and four daughters. Two are married, two are teachers, one attends school and another one assists his parents in their farming business.  

Bun and her husband are rice farmers. In addition, they also built a water storage tower and have distributed it to houses in the neighborhood. They run a private water utility service.

Bun is asking for a loan in the amount of $1,500 to purchase a motorbike for her daughter to drive to school.   

In the photo, Bun is at home, not at the farm.

loans.use: to purchase a motorbike for her daughter to drive to school

loans.name: Sotheary

texts.en:
Sotheary (in the photo) and her husband are teachers. Besides teaching, she also weaves silk at home when she is not at school, and her husband raises cows and grows rice. The couple has been marred since 2006 and have two sons: one attends school and another one is still young. They live across the Mekong River about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh, the capital city of Cambodia.

Sotheary is asking for a Kiva loan of $1,300 to continue her silk weaving business by buying silk material, and also to dig a well. She will also use a part of the loan to assist in her husband’s rice farm by buying seed, fertilizer and pesticide.

loans.use: to purchase silk materials for her silk weaving business and dig a well

loans.name: Maribeth

texts.en:
Maribeth, aged 33, is noted as an industrious person in the village. With her three children, who serve as her inspiration, Maribeth is in the business of selling barbecue in the barrio. This occupation is difficult to prepare but, for Maribeth, it is enjoyable and fun. She really loves her work. This maybe causes her to attract customers.

With the love she showed to her work and customers, she gained customers and income. In this matter, Maribeth is asking for a loan of 20,000 PHP to buy meat (pork and chicken), sugar, catsup and salt for preparing barbecue.

In the future, she hopes for a bigger amount of profit for the improvement of their living conditions.

loans.use: to buy meat (pork and chicken), sugar, catsup and salt for preparing barbecue

loans.name: Kambarkhon

texts.ru: Камбархон трудолюбивый и добрый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет одного ребенка. Более 10 лет он занимается купле- продажей сухофруктов. В бизнесе занимается один. Приобретает товар с местных рынков по низкой цене, а затем реализует подороже. Имеет дополнительный доход от денежных переводов, который отправляет его сыновей. Камбархон также занимается выращиванием сельхозкультур, такие как кукуруза, пшеницы и другие сельхозпродукции. Также занимается скотоводством. Имеет хорошую репутацию и кредитное досье. Камбархон запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки мелкого рогатого скота. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Kambarkhon is a hardworking and good man.  He is married and is raising a child.  He has been in the dried fruit business for over ten years.  He runs this business by himself.  He acquires his merchandise at local markets for a low price, then sells it for a little more.  He has an additional income from the money his sons send to him.  Kambarkhon also grows food crops such as corn, wheat, and other crops.  He also raises livestock.   He has a good reputation and credit history.  Kambarkhon is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni for the purchase of sheep and goats.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy sheep and goats

loans.name: Chanthoeun

texts.en:
Chanthoeun (pictured here), age 30, is a garment worker. Her husband, Sokrit, age 34, is a construction worker. They have been married since 2001 and have two sons: one attends school and another one is still young. The family lives in a village about fifteen kilometers from Phnom Penh City.

Chanthoeun commutes to work by taking a motorbike with her brother-in-law. She wants to buy her own motorbike to get work, so she decided to apply for a loan.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to get work

loans.name: Olga

texts.es:
Olga, es una mujer hacendosa, tiene 36 años de edad; vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Alejandro de 38 años y sus dos hijos Percy de 17 años y Yany de 11 años a quien le dedican gran parte de su vida para tenga una mejor calidad de vida. La actividad que efectúa Olga, es criar animales en especial los chanchos; esta labor lo realiza hace 02 años con la ayuda de su esposo quien esta constante apoyándola para que después obtenga unos buenos resultados con su criadero. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver a sus cerditos bien grandes y gorditos; ya que  para ella estos animales  son muy rentables en las temporadas de festividades porque es ahí donde mas le piden sus clientes. Es por ello que acude a los préstamos de MFP para que le apoyen en lograr sus objetivos. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP; se siente contenta por darles este apoyo y de esa manera lograr cumplir con sus objetivos. En su banco comunal es una socia alegre y solidaria.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará un cerdito pequeño para que le haga crecer durante un año y luego poder venderla.
texts.en:
Olga is an industrious, 36-year-old woman. She lives in her own house with her 38-year-old husband and two children, 17-year-old Percy and 11-year-old Yany. They spend a great part of their lives trying to give their children a better life. Olga raises animals, especially pigs. For 2 years, she has been working with her husband, who is always helping her so that she can achieve good results with the breeding. What she likes most about her work is being able to see her piglets grow big and fat. For her these animals can be very profitable during festival seasons, when her customers order the most from her.

She comes to the lenders at MFP so that they may help her meet her objectives. This will be her 3rd loan cycle with MFP. She is happy with the support they offer so that she achieve her goals. She is a happy, caring member of her communal bank. With 2,000 nuevos soles, she will purchase a small pig that she will raise over the next year and then sell.

loans.use: to buy a small pig.

loans.name: Toir

texts.ru: Тоир трудолюбивый и добрый юноша. Он очень активный парень и старается помогать своим родителям в содержании семьи. Более 3-х лет он занимается выращиванием и продажей сельхозпродукции. В бизнесе помогают его отец и брат и они все дружно работают.  Тоир хочет обрабатать свою землю, чтобы посеять семена. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки семян и минеральных удобрений. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Toir is a hardworking and decent young man.  He is a very energetic guy and tries to help his parents support the family.  He has been growing and selling food crops for more than 3 years.  His father and his brother help him with the business, and they all work together like clockwork. 

Toir wants to cultivate his land in preparation for sowing.  With this goal, he his requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni for the purchase of seed and mineral fertilizers.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seed and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en: Lolita, 55, is working very hard for the opportunity to experience a better living standard. She manages a rice mill in the village, and in order to maintain good quality service is requesting a loan of P25,000  for its repair and maintenance. Lolita hopes for the development of her rice mill business in order to soon experience a measure of prosperity.

loans.use: to repair and maintain her rice-milling machine.

loans.name: Khady

texts.fr:
Madame Khady est âgée de 29 ans, elle est mariée et mère de 2 enfants dont l’ainé a 5 ans et  le cadet 1 an. Khady, avant de se lancer dans le commerce de tissus, vendait du pain à domicile. Voyant que le bénéfice était très minime, elle a changé d’activité  dans l’espoir de pouvoir gagner mieux. Elle s’est alors lancé dans la vente d’effets pour femmes : tissus, chaussures, sacs... ; activité qu’elle exerce maintenant depuis 6 ans. Elle a déjà eu à bénéficier d’un crédit de 100000F CFA, et demande une augmentation de 50000F CFA pour améliorer petit à petit son exploitation. Elle va acheter  pour revendre, des sacs à main, des bracelets et des tissus divers.
Khady ne supporte aucunes charges, mais travaille afin de diversifier ses produits et pour une amélioration des conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Madame Khady is 29 years old, married and the mother of two children, aged five and one. Before starting to sell fabric, Khady sold bread from her home. As the profit from selling bread was very low, she switched to a different business in the hope of increasing her earnings. So she began selling women's accessories: fabric, shoes, bags, etc. She has been involved in this activity for six years. Khady has already received a loan of 100,000 CFA francs, and is asking for an increase of 50,000 francs in order to gradually expand her business. She wants to buy handbags, bracelets and miscellaneous fabric, all for resale.
Khady has no financial responsibilities but she works to diversify her products, and to improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy fabric, bags, shoes, and bracelets for resale.

loans.name: Igor

texts.ru:
Игорь женат. Его супругу зовут Наталья. У них есть сын Артем. Игорь имеет собственный бизнес.
Игорь занимается продажей мебели,  а в не рабочие дни  базара занимается перевозкой грузов. Он работает в этих двух направлениях на протяжении 14 лет.  Но весной прошлого года Игорь попал в сильную аварию.  После лечения Игорь повернулся на работу, хотя было тяжело и морально, и материально.  Игорь настойчивый, трудолюбивый и открытый. 

Игорь просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 15000 гривен на пополнение ассортимента мебели. Кредит поможет увеличить доход. А доход пойдет на улучшение жилищных условий семьи Игоря.
texts.en:
Igor is married.  His wife is named Natalya and their son is Artem.  Igor has his own business selling furniture and, on days when the market is closed, he hauls freight.  He has been working in these two areas for 14 years.  However, last Spring he was in a very bad accident.  After he recovered, he returned to work, although it was both physically and emotionally difficult.  Igor is persevering, hardworking, and straightforward.

Igor is asking to be given a loan of 15,000 hryven to augment his stock of furniture.  The loan will help him to increase his income, which will be used to improve his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to augment his stock of furniture

loans.name: Norma

texts.es: Norma, de 38 años, es una mujer de muchas labores; ella vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo y sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes brinda lo mejor. Norma, se levanta muy temprano para realizar sus actividades, ella se levanta a las 04:30 de la mañana para ir a vender su desayuno al paradero de su localidad donde transitan mucha gente; es ahí donde ofrece sus ricas bebidas como: maca, soya, ponche y sus panes con queso, palta, entre tantas al gusto del cliente. Esta actividad llega a terminar muy rápido y luego se va a ofrecer sus electrodomésticos a los señores de su avenida quienes le llegan a comprar a un precio cómodo. Ella, comenta que estos dos trabajos le han ayudado mucho con la economía de su hogar; es por eso que no descansa para después tener una mejora calidad de vida. Lo que ahora prioriza es poder viajar a la ciudad de lima y traer algunos artefactos que sus clientes le piden. Este será su crédito número 03 con MFP y se compromete a ser puntual con sus cuotas de pago como en anteriores y asimismo agradece a sus socias de su banco por trabajar de manera responsable. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles comprará algunos artefactos como licuadora, cocina, entre otros, para que pueda vender a sus clientes que ya acuden a ella.
texts.en:
Norma, 34, is a woman of many trades. She lives in her house together with her husband and her three beloved children, to whom she offers the best. 

Norma wakes up very early to carry out her activities. She wakes up at 4:30 am to go and sell breakfast at her town's bus stop, where there are many passers-by. It is there where she offers her delicious drinks such as maca (a radish-like root) juice, soy milk, fruit punch, and her breads with cheese or avocado, among others, as the customers want them. This activity finishes very quickly. 

Then she goes on selling electrical appliances to customers on her street, who pay a good price. She mentions that these two jobs have helped her a lot with her household's finances. This is why she doesn't rest - to have a better quality of life. Her main priority now is to travel to the city of Lima and bring back some devices that her customers ask for.           

This will be her third loan with MFP and she commits to be on time with her payment installments, as she has been before. She also thanks her associates at her communal bank for working in a responsible manner.      

With the new money she will buy some devices such as a blender and a stove, among others, to sell them to her customers, that have turned to her before.

loans.use: To buy devices such as a blender and a stove

loans.name: Lidio

texts.es: Lidio, de 38 años, un señor responsable, sus obligaciones es cuidar de sus dos queridos hijos ya que quedo viudo hace 01 año por circunstancias de la vida; ahora lo que mas quiere es poder  dar una mejora calidad de vida a sus hijos. Lidio, es un hombre de lucro se dedica con mucho cuidado a sembrar  plantaciones de café, actividad que realiza hace mas de 30 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros, de esa manera extrae rápido los frutos para luego venderlas en los centros de acopio, quienes le gratifican buena ganancia por cada kilogramo de café. A pesar de todo le resulta difícil el transportar su sacos de cosecha hasta su  localidad; lugar donde se encuentran las empresas acopiadoras. Con el tiempo  desea comprar más plantas de cacao y café para incrementar en su terreno que prioriza por comprarlas ya que de la misma manera pueda tener buen resultado en sus próximas cosechas y con las ganancias dar una buena estadía a sus hijos. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP; se siente muy contento por la confianza que le dan y esta dispuesto a pagar sus cuotas mensuales ya que de esa manera podrá acceder a otro préstamo. En su banco comunal se siente agradecido por permitirles trabajar junto a ellos. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará un terreno para seguir cultivando plantas de las que produce.
texts.en: 38 year old Lidio is a responsible man. His responsibilities include looking after his two beloved children, as things worked out so that he has been a widower for a year. Now what he most wants is to be able to give his children a better quality of life. Lidio is a man who earns a profit. He carefully tends his coffee plantations, work that he has been doing for more than 30 years. During harvest time he has the help of daily laborers, and so he can rapidly harvest the beans and then sell them in the center where all the farmers take their coffee. Here he gets a good return on every kilo of coffee. The difficult thing for him is to transport his sacks of coffee beans to the collection center where the buyers congregate. In time, he wants to buy more cocoa and coffee plants to increase his plantings and he is prioritizing buying these as they will bring him good returns in his next harvests and he will use the profits to give his children a good life. This will be his fourth loan from MFP. He is very happy with the confidence they have shown in him and is ready to make his monthly repayments as this will enable him to access other loans. He is glad that the members of his community bank are able to work together. He will use the $1125 to buy land to grow more plants.

loans.use: to buy agricultural land.

loans.name: Monica

texts.es:
Mónica, de 27 años, vive en su propia casa junto a su cónyuge Edgar de 35 años y sus 02 estimados hijos a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. Mónica, es una mujer alegre, se dedica a labrar la tierra para  después cultivar plantas de café; esta actividad la realiza hace 20 años. En tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de sus cercanos para culminar rápido la cosecha de sus frutos y poder hacer el secado de los granos para luego llevarlas a vender a los centros de acopio. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder comercializarlas a buen precio ya que son de buena producción y considera que lo más difícil es tener que movilizarse con sus sacos de cosecha desde la chacra hasta los centros de acopio. Para mas adelante espera en aumentar su producción y así obtener una buena estadía. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP; esta dispuesta a seguir cumpliendo puntual con sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es una socia muy solidaria.
Con los 500 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de café  para aumentar su producción.
texts.en:
27 year old Mónica lives in her own house along with her partner, 35 year old Edgar, and their two beloved children (who she wants to give a better quality of life.) Mónica is a happy woman. She works the land, cultivating coffee. She has been doing this for 20 years. At harvest time she has the help of her neighbors to quickly gather and dry the beans so that, later, she can take them to be sold at the center where the buyers gather. What she likes most about her work is being able to sell her coffee at a good price as her produce is good. The most difficult thing is transporting her sacks of beans from the farm to the buyers. In the future, she hopes to increase her production and so to obtain a good standard of living. This will be her second loan from MFP. She is ready to make her repayments on time. She is a very supportive member of her community bank.
She will use the $200 to buy coffee plants to increase her production.

loans.use: to buy coffee plants.

loans.name: Sergei

texts.ru:
Сергей женат. Его супруга зовут Наталья. У них есть дочка Алина. 

Сергей работает в магазине «Автоклуб». Ему нравится это направление. Сергей трудолюбивый, ответственный и открытый.  Жена  Наталья частный предприниматель. 

Сергей просит предоставить ему кредит в сумме 15000 гривен на улучшение жилищных условий. Он хочет сделать ремонт в комнате и коридоре. А также купить шкаф.
texts.en:
Sergei is married.  His wife is named Natalya and their young daughter is Alina.

Sergei works in a store called "Autoclub."  He really likes his work.  Sergei is hardworking, responsible, and above-board.  His wife Natalya is a private entrepreneur.   

Sergei is asking to be given a loan of 15,000 hryven to improve their living conditions.  He would like to renovate one of the rooms in their apartment, to renovate the hall, and to buy a wardrobe.

loans.use: to do home repairs

loans.name: Moulkere

texts.fr:
Madame Moulkere, âgée de 59 ans est commerçante depuis 15 ans. Elle s’active dans la vente de produits divers  tel que le charbon de bois, le beurre de karité, les céréales (mil, mais) les tomates, le poisson fumé et même des fruits de période comme présentement, les jujubes, les  oranges.
Madame Moulkere est mariée et mère de famille. Elle donne sa participation dans la gestion de la dépense quotidienne en payant les factures. Elle travaille pour diversifier les produits et services. Dans l’avenir, elle aimerait créer une entreprise pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Madame Moulkere, age 59, has been a merchant for fifteen years. She sells diverse products such as charcoal, shea butter, grains (millet, corn), tomatoes, smoked fish, and even seasonal fruits such as jujubes and oranges (which are currently in season).
Madame Moulkere is a married mother. She helps out with the household expenses by paying the bills. She works hard to diversify her products and services. In the future, she would like to create a business for her children.

loans.use: to buy diverse products: coal, shea butter, millet, corn, peanuts, tomatoes.

loans.name: Sanginmurod

texts.ru: Сангинмурод женат и на воспитании имеет четверых детей. Он очень трудолюбивый человек, который более 5 лет занимается выращиванием бахчевых культур. Жена занимается домохозяйством. Сангинмурод старается расширить свой бизнес и поднять урожайность земли. Он хочет обрабатывать свою землю и для этого ему необходимо закупить минеральных удобрений. С этой целью он запрашивает займ в размере 7500 Сомони. Также он хочет покупать семян для посева.
texts.en: Sanginmurod is married and is raising four children.  He is a very hardworking man who has been growing melons for more than five years. His wife is a homemaker.  Sanginmurod is trying to expand his business and increase his land's productivity.  He wants to prepare his land for planting, and for this he needs to buy mineral fertilizers.  With this goal, he is requesting a loan of 7,500 somoni.  He also wants to buy seed.

loans.use: to buy seed and mineral fertilizers

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Sonia, de 29 años, una mujer alegre y luchadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Prudencio de 32 años, quienes esperan un buen bienestar para su hija Erika de 09 años. Sonia, es una mujer llana pero con el entusiasmo de sobresalir en la vida; se dedica a remover la tierra para luego cultivar café, A través de 8 años lleva trabajando en su propio terreno con la intención de hacer crecer sus plantaciones y poder obtener buena ganancia de las cosechas.  Considera que lo más fácil es tener el apoyo de su pareja ya que de esa manera ambos se esfuerzan por tener los mejores resultados de sus plantaciones. Ahora prioriza es comprar un terreno en la que puedan cultivar mas plantas de la que normalmente produce. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP; se siente agradecida por la confianza que obtiene por parte de los financistas y asegura que seguirá siendo puntual en sus cuotas de pago. En su banco comunal es muy querida por ser responsable. Con los 1,500 nuevos soles, adjuntará con sus ahorros y comprará su terreno que tanto necesita.
texts.en: 29 year old Sonia is a happy and hardworking woman. She lives in her own house with her partner, 32 year old Prudencio. They hope their 9 year old daughter Erika will do well. Sonia is a straightforward women but she has an enthusiasm to excel in life. She works preparing land to later grow coffee. For 8 years she has been working her own land with the intention of growing her plantation and making good returns on her harvests. She thinks the thing that makes her life easiest is having the support of her partner as, in this way, they can strive for the best results together. Her current priority is buying land where she can grow more plants than she currently has. This will be her second loan from MFP and she is grateful for the trust put in her by the lenders and she will continue being punctual with her repayments. She is well loved in her community bank for being responsible. She will add the $575 to her savings and buy as much land as she needs.

loans.use: to buy agricultural land.

loans.name: Alisher

texts.ru: Алишер добрый и трудолюбивый человек. Он женат и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Жена работает в больнице, она медсестра. Более 3-х лет Алишер занимается купле- продажей скота. Имеет богатый опыт в данном бизнесе. Данный бизнес является прибыльным и приносит ему хороший доход. Алишер запрашивает займ в размере 10000 Сомони для покупки скота с целью пополнения оборотного капитала. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Alisher is a good and hardworking man.  He is married and is raising two children.  His wife is a nurse and works in a hospital.  Alisher has been in the cattle business for over three years.  He has a wealth of experience in this business.  His business is profitable and brings him a good income. 

Alisher is requesting a loan of 10,000 somoni for the purchase of cattle, with the goal of supplementing his working capital.  He is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Ever

texts.es: Ever, de 21 años, es un joven alegre y decidido, vive en su propia casa,  junto a su pareja y su pequeño hijo; ellos anhelan tener un buen bienestar y una mejor calidad de vida. Ever, es un hombre de provecho se dedica a la  crianza de chanchos, cuya actividad lo realiza hace más de 06 meses. En tiempos de festividades de su localidad como por ejemplo la navidad,  pues los campesinos de su zona buscan a los mejores chanchos para poder sacrificarlas y hacer de ella un buen aperitivo. Ever siempre esta al tanto de su granja brindándoles una buena alimentación para que puedan crecer sanos. Con el tiempo anhela en comprar más puercos para su comercialización; pero ahora solo quiere en dar una buena nutrición a sus cerditos para que crezcan sanos, grandes y sobre todo robustos. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP; esta dispuesto a seguir pagando todas sus cuotas puntualmente. En su banco comunal es un socio muy responsable. Con los 500 nuevos soles, comprará comida para la alimentación de sus puercos.
texts.en: 21 year old Ever is a happy and determined young man. He lives in his own house with his partner and their little son. They yearn for wellbeing and to have a better quality of life. Ever is a worthy person who raises pigs and his been doing this for more than 6 months. At feast times in his area, for example at Christmas, the country people look for this best pigs to kill and then make good food from them. Ever always takes care of his pigs, taking them good food so that they grow up healthy. In time, he wants to buy more pigs to sell, but for now he just wants to give his piglets nutritious food so that they grow to be healthy, big, and, above all, sturdy. This will be his second loan from MFP. He is ready to make his repayments punctually. He is a responsible member of his community bank. He will use the $200 to buy food for his pigs.

loans.use: to buy pig food.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 51  años de edad, es esposa de Alberto de 50 años  y tiene 02 hijos, Fredy de 24 años, y Yober  de 19 años de edad. Juntos viven en su casa  propia. La actividad que realiza Rosa, es labrar la tierra en su propia chacra que hace 20 años llego a adquirir con mucho cuidado. Rosa, junto a su pareja elaboran el cuidado de sus plantas de café y cacao. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver los apreciados frutos que con el tiempo le resulta  beneficioso por la manera como efectúa su producción; por otra parte considera difícil que las plagas afecten sus siembras ya que son difíciles de lidiarlas. Es por eso que acude a MFP para requerir un préstamo en cual ayude con sus objetivos de trabajo. Con el tiempo su mayor anhelo es comprar plantas de café para luego cultivar en su terreno. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP; por el se compromete a pagar durante las fechas establecidas, además, se siente conforme por las buenas decisiones que toma su banco comunal. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, contratará jornales para que puedan ayudarle en el desyerbo de malezas.
texts.en: 51 year old Rosa is married to 50 year old Alberto and they have two children, 24 year old Fredy and 19 year old Yober. They live together in their own home. Rosa works the land and has her own farm that she has been working with great care for 20 years. Rosa and her partner care for their coffee and cocoa plants. What she likes most about her work is being able to see the precious fruits that grow over time, benefitting from the way she has cultivated them. On the other hand, she finds it difficult that insect pests affect her plants and they can be difficult to deal with. It is for this reason that she came to MFP to request a loan that will help with her work goals. In time, her greatest desire is to buy coffee plants to grow on her land. This will be her fourth loan from MFP and she promises to make her repayments at the set times. What is more, she is in accord with the good decisions made by her community bank. She will use the $375 to hire laborers to help her with the weeding.

loans.use: to hire laborers.

loans.name: Oulimata

texts.fr: Madame Oulimata  est âgée  de 42 ans et habite dans l’une des localités de la capitale sénégalaise. Elle est mariée et mère  de 3 enfants. Elle évolue dans le commerce de jus de fruits naturels  qu’elle prépare elle-même. Elle est aussi traiteur en restauration. Ceci représente son activité secondaire. Elle  a hérité son activité de commerce de sa tante qui l’a éduqué.  Depuis  son, bas âge, elle revendait   les  produits que sa tante ramenait de ses voyages.  Elle a choisi son activité de vente de fruits car les produits locaux sont  très prisés par la clientèle. Elle est membre d’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC  et sollicite un crédit de  300 000 frs prévu pour l’achat d’un chariot qui permettra a son employé de transporter le jus qu’elle commercialise. L’accroissement de ses bénéfices lui permettra de développer son activité de commerce et de  mieux prendre en charge ses besoins personnels.
texts.en: Mrs. Oulimata is 42 years old. She lives in  one of the neighborhoods of   Senegal's capital city. She is married and the mother of three. She sells natural fruit juices that she prepares herself. She also cooks food for sale, as a secondary activity. She has inherited her business from her aunt, who has taught her. From an early age on, she used to resell goods brought by her aunt from her travels. She has chosen selling fruits because local products are  very popular with the customers. She is a member of a branch of U-IMCEC and seeking a loan of 300,000 francs for the purchase of a cart that will allow her helper to transport the juices to her selling location. The increased revenues will allow her to grow her business and better provide for her personal needs.

loans.use: to buy a cart needed for selling fruit juices.

loans.name: Salavmat

texts.ru: Салавмат более 6 лет занимается купле- продажей детской одежды. Салавмат замужем и любящая мать пятерых детей. Она очень активная женщина и старается расширить свой бизнес. Она приобретает товар 1-2 раза в неделю. Так как она привозит высококачественные товары, её клиенты доверяет ей и приходят за покупками к ней. Салавмат запрашивает займ для покупки новой одежды с целью расширения бизнеса.
texts.en: Salavmat has been in the children's clothing business for over 6 years.  Salavmat is married and the loving mother of five children.  She is a very energetic woman and is trying to expand her business.  She buys merchandise once or twice a week.  Since she brings in high-quality merchandise, her customers trust her and come to her for their purchases.  Salavmat is requesting a loan for the purchase of new clothing with the goal of expanding her business.

loans.use: to buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Rukhshona

texts.ru: Рухшона разведенная женщина, которая на воспитании имеет двух сыновей. Она очень трудолюбивая женщина и более одного года  занимается пошивом женской одежды. В основном она шьет национальные платья, вышивку, реставрирует женские костюмы и кожаные изделия. Ателье находится в торговом центре города. Имеет 5 работников- мастеров, которые с ней работают и одну ученицу. Открыла бизнес  собственными денежными средствами в 2010 году. Ее мать также помогает по бизнесу. Рухшона хотела бы получить займ для покупки фурнитур и оплата за аренду помещений.
texts.en: Rukhshona is a divorced woman who is raising two sons.  She is a very hardworking woman and has been making women's clothing for more than a year.  Primarily, she sews traditional dresses, embroiders, and repairs women's suits and leather goods.  Her studio is in the city's shopping center.  She has five trained workers and one student.  She opened her business with her own funds in 2010.  Her mother also helps her with the business.  Rukhshona would like to take out a loan for the purchase of sewing supplies and to pay the rent for her storefront.

loans.use: to purchase sewing supplies and pay for rent

loans.name: Albina

texts.es:
Albina de 66 años, es una mujer humilde y sencilla; desde que falleció su esposo ahora ella esta al tanto de sus dos queridos hijos Daniel de 24 años  y Joel de 19 años y juntos habitan en su propia casa. Albina, es una mujer muy empeñosa, desde muy tempranas horas se dirige a sus campos de cultivo donde siembra plantas de coca; este producto le llevo a seguir adelante para que pueda dar una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos; lleva 37 años realizando esta actividad, antes lo hacia con la ayuda de su esposo y ahora lo realiza con el apoyo de sus dos hijos quienes la apoyan en todos sus esfuerzos. En la cogida de la hoja de coca pues cuenta con el apoyo de jornaleros quienes le ayudan a extraer sus hojas de manera rápida, después realiza el secado  correspondiente para llevarlas a vender a las sociedades de compra; es ahí donde le remuneran buenas  ganancias por cada arroba de coca. Sus planes a futuro es que sus hijos sean profesionales y tengan una buena estadía. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago. Asimismo agradece a los integrantes de su banco comunal por ser personas responsables y solidarias.
Con el crédito solicitado contratará jornaleros para que le apoyen a fumigar sus plantas y con el resto ayudará a sus hijos en sus gastos de estudio.
texts.en: Albina is 66 and is a humble and simple woman.  Since her husband passed away, she now watches out for her two beloved children:  Daniel, who is 24, and Joel, who is 19.  They all live together in their own home.  Albina is a very hard-working woman.  Starting very early in the morning, she goes to her fields where she harvests coca plants.  This product lets her get ahead and give her children a better quality of life.  She has done this work for 37 years.  She used to do it with the help of her husband, and now she has the help of her 2 sons, who help her with her efforts.  When harvesting the coca, she has help from day workers, who help her pick the leaves quickly.  Afterwards, she takes them to the buying organizations.  This is where they pay her well by weight of the coca.  Her future plans are to see her children become professionals and that they have a good stay.  This will be her fifth loan with Microfinanzas Prisma, and she promises to be very punctual with her payments.  She is thankful to the members of her communal bank for being responsible and supportive.  With the requested loan, she will hire day laborers to help her fumigate her plants, and she will use the rest to help her children with their educational costs.

loans.use: To hire day laborers and to help her children with their education.

loans.name: Rosa

texts.es: Rosa, de 26 años, es una mujer coqueta y hacendosa, vive en una casa alquilada junto a su pareja Juan de 29 años y sus 02 queridas hijas Mireya de 06 años y Jayde de 05 años, a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida. El puesto de ventas de abarrotes de la señora Rosa es muy presentable y ordenado; es por ello que a la gente de su localidad en especial los de su avenida se dirigen a comprar sus productos ya que pueden encontrar lo necesario; hace 16 años empezó a trabajar con su negocio y comenta que le ha ido muy bien; ahora gracias a sus ganancias ha logrado comprar un terreno en la pueda construir su hogar. Ella esta siempre al pendiente de su bodega y su esposo le ayuda en los trabajos de la chacra. Ahora lo que mas anhela es poder incrementar mas productos para su negocio y darles una buena educación a sus pequeñas hijas. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP; se compromete a ser muy puntual con sus cuotas de pago como en las anteriores. En su banco comunal es una socia muy responsable y solidaria. Con el préstamo solicitado comprará mas productos de arroz, azúcar, leche, entre otros. Y de esa forma llegará a abastecer su tienda.
texts.en: Rosa, who is 26 years old, is a sweet and hardworking woman.  She lives in a rented house together with her partner Juan, who is 29 years old, and their two dear daughters, 6-year old Mireya and 5-year old Jayde.  She hopes to offer them a better quality of life.  Señora Rosa's shop is very presentable and organized.  That is why the people in her neighborhood, especially those on her street, come to her shop to make their purchases; they can find what they need.  She started her business 16 years ago and says that it has been going very well for her.  Now, thanks to her earnings, she has been able to purchase a plot of land on which to build her home.  Rosa is always devoted to her store and her husband helps with with the work on their small farm.  Now what Rosa most wants is to be able to increase the inventory for her business and to give her young daughters a good education.  This will be her 5th loan with MFP.  Rosa promises to be timely with her re-payment, just like she was with her previous loans.  Rosa is a very responsible and supportive member of her communal bank.  With the requested loan, she will purchase more rice, sugar and milk products, among other items.  And then she will be able to stock up her store.

loans.use: to purchase rice, sugar and milk to stock up her store.

loans.name: Mohira

texts.ru: Мохира замужем и на воспитании имеет двоих детей. Она очень трудолюбивая и добрая женщина. Муж является мастером. Более 3-х лет Мохира занимается купле- продажей детской одежды и мелочевки. В бизнесе помогает сестра. Один-два раза в неделю она приобретает товар, чтобы пополнить оборотный капитал. Мохира запрашивает займ в размере 5000 Сомони для покупки летней детской одежды. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Mohira is married and is raising two children.  She is a very hardworking and decent woman.  Her husband is a craftsman.  For over three years, she has been selling children's clothes and sundries.  Her sister helps her with the business.  She buys merchandise once or twice a week to replenish her inventory.  Mohira is requesting a loan of 5,000 somoni for the purchase of children's summer clothes.  She is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy seasonal clothes

loans.name: Muyasar

texts.ru:
Муясар трудолюбивая добрая и честная женщина, которая на воспитании имеет троих детей. Более 11 лет она занимается купле- продажей сельхозпродукции. Имеет широкий ассортимент овощей. Данный бизнес является прибыльным и она имеет много постоянных клиентов. Она обновляет свой товар по чаще, один-два раза в неделю.
Она всегда привозит свежие продукты. Муясар хотела бы получить займ для покупки сельхозпродукции с целью расширения бизнеса. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en:
Muyasar is a hardworking, good, and honest woman who is raising three children.  For over 11 years she has been selling fruits and vegetables.  She has a wide assortment of vegetables.  This business is profitable and she has many regular customers.  She restocks her inventory frequently--once or twice a week.  She always brings in fresh fruits and vegetables.  

Muyasar would like to take out a loan for the purchase of fruits with the goal of expanding her business.  She is relying on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy fruits

loans.name: Aydee

texts.es: Aydee, de 30 años de edad, es una mujer buena y afanosa en los que haberes de su hogar, vive en su propia casa junto a su pareja Yuri de 38 años y su querida hija Britney de 09 años; quienes desean tener un buen futuro con el tiempo. La actividad que realiza Aydee, es labrar la tierra en su propio campo de cultivo que durante 14  años llego a adquirir con mucho esmero. Aydee junto a su pareja elaboran el cuidado de sus plantas de cacao, café y hojas de coca. Lo que mas le gusta de su trabajo es poder ver los apreciados frutos que con el tiempo le resulta  provechoso por la manera como efectúa su producción; por otra parte considera difícil que las plagas afecten sus siembras ya que son difíciles de lidiarlas. Es por eso que acude a MFP para requerir un préstamo en cual ayude con sus objetivos de trabajo. Con el tiempo desea en agrandar sus terrenos y poder cultivar mas plantas de cacao. Este será su crédito número 05 con MFP; y se siente contenta de saber que obtendrá un apoyo financiero. En su banco comunal le gusta trabajar con personas que ayuden a las posibilidades de su prójimo. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de cacao para sembrar en su chacra y con el resto contratará peones para que le ayuden.
texts.en:
Aydee, 30 years old, is a good woman and industrious, having household property, living in her own house together with her partner, Yuri, who is 38 years old and her dear daughter Britney who is 9 years old. They hope that with time she will have a good future. 

Aydee farms the land in her own fields that over 14 years she has obtained through extreme care. Aydee together with her partner take care of cocoa, coffee and coca leaves. What she likes most about her work is being able to see the valued fruit that with time is the profitable result because of the way she cares for the production. On the other hand, what she finds difficult is the pests that affect their crops that are so hard to fight against. 

This is why she went to MFP to request a loan which will help her with her work objectives. Over time she wants to add more land and to be able to grow more cocoa plants. This will be her fifth loan through MFP and she feels happy knowing that she will obtain financial assistance. In her communal bank she likes working with people and having the possibility of helping a neighbor. With the 2,000 soles, she will buy cocoa plants in order to plant her farm and with the rest she will hire laborers to help her.

loans.use: to buy more cocoa plants and hire laborers

loans.name: Fathiya

texts.en:
Fathiya is a 51-year-old housewife. She lives with her husband and their nine children, except the ones who are already married. To help her husband, a bus driver, support their big family, Fathiya started to make different kinds of pickles at home to sell. It has been 11 years since she started. Besides her daily new customers, Fathiya has old customers and families who only buy their pickles from her every time they run out.

Fathiya has applied for this loan to buy different sizes of bottles, since some people are looking to buy small amounts based on their needs. She also wants to try making new kinds of pickles that are not available in the market.

Fathiya is a conservative person, so she asked her daughter, Hind, to take her place in the photo.

loans.use: to buy different sizes of bottles for the pickles she makes

loans.name: Suha

texts.en:
Suha wanted to take advantage of the fact that her kids are still young and she has time to help her husband provide their children with a respectful life, so she started a home business making fake flowers and plants that are used for internal decorations. Suha is a conservative person, so she has asked her brother-in-law to take her place in the photo.

Suha is a 27-year-old married lady. She is the mother of one daughter and one son. Suha has applied for this loan in order to buy more plastic and materials that are used to make more colorful plants.

loans.use: to buy more plastic and materials for making fake flowers

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en: Elsa is a 31 year-old single mother who lives in a rented home along with her two daughters: Jackelin, 10, and Yasuri, 8, to whom she provides meticulous care and love.  She is a very hardworking woman who has a business selling vegetables in the market in her area.  She has been doing this work for 8 years, and for her this work is very easy.  She does not need a lot of help, and so she is able to do the work on her own, although she enjoys being with her daughters because they are her only happiness.
