Nao has applied for this loan to buy a couple of cows for the maintenance of a rice field. And she also plans to purchase seeds and fertilizer with the remainder. Nao hopes to gather a rich harvest in the coming years. This will allow her to generate income for the family and insure improved living conditions for them.

loans.use: to buy a couple of cows for the maintenance of a rice field

loans.name: Sreyna

texts.en:
Sreyna (pictured here) is 31 years old and her husband, An, is 33 years old. They live in a suburb of Phnom Penh about 25 kilometers away. They have been married since 2004 and have one son who attends school and one daughter who is still very young.  

Sreyna is a garment worker, while her husband is a taxi driver. She is asking for her first loan of $1,000 to build a kitchen and a toilet for family use.

loans.use: To build kitchen and a restroom for family use.

loans.name: Thoen

texts.en:
Thoen (in the photo), age 57, lives in a village about 17 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. She is a widow with one son who is a barber and two daughters. One is married and the other one is a tailor.

Thoen sells grocery items at her home. She is requesting a loan of $1,000 to repair the house she lives in. She will use a part of the loam to buy more grocery items for sale.

loans.use: To repair the house she lives in and buy more grocery items for sale.

loans.name: Sinay

texts.en:
Sinay (in the photo), age 44, is a widow with one son who is a construction worker and one daughter who attends grade 12. The family lives in a village about 20 kilometers from Phnom Penh City. 

Sinay is asking for her first loan in the amount of $500 to add to her own money to buy a motorcycle for her son to use to get to work.

loans.use: To add to her own money to buy a motorcycle for her son to use to get to work.

loans.name: Srey Leak

texts.en:
Srey Leak (in the photo) is 23 years old and is a garment worker. Her husband, Sitha, is 21 years old. They live in a village about thirty-five kilometers from Phnom Penh City. They have been married since 2010 and just have one young son.  

Srey Leak is asking for her first loan in the amount of $1,200 to assist in her parents’ rice farming business by buying seeds, fertilizer, and pesticide.

loans.use: to assist in her parents’ rice farming business by buying seeds, fertilizer, and pesticide.

loans.name: Senaida

texts.es:
Senaida es una joven de 21 años de edad que proviene de una familia de escasos recursos, los cuales son campesinos afectados por la violencia que poco a poco han ido esforzándose para salir adelante a pesar de sus adversidades. Debido a que Senaida tenía su sueño de estudiar una carrera universitaria y no tenía los recursos con los cuales pudiera pagar sus estudios, decidió iniciar su negocio de venta de productos de uso personal a través de catálogo y de esta manera genera los ingresos con los que se permite tener una educación universitaria. Senaida siempre ha querido salir adelante y en un futuro poder ofrecerles a sus padres una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas, por lo que se esfuerza en su negocio y en sus estudios para poder sacarlos adelante. En su negocio ofrece una variedad de productos a sus clientes, los cuales son principalmente sus amigos, vecinos y compañeros de estudio, que le han garantizado muy buenas ventas, sin embargo, desea ofrecer una mayor variedad para que sus ingresos incrementen considerablemente. Es por esto que Senaida busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de uso personal para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Senaida espera que de esta manera sus ingresos aumenten considerablemente, pues sus clientes encontrarán en su negocio mayor variedad de productos para satisfacer sus necesidades. Además, Senaida espera que con mayores ingresos sus padres puedan gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mayores oportunidades económicas. Senaida tiene el sueño de poder terminar sus estudios y conseguir un empleo que sea bien remunerado y alternarlo con su negocio, y de esta manera pueda ofrecerles a sus padres la tranquilidad de una estabilidad económica para descansar de tanto que han trabajado.
texts.en:
Senaida, 21, is a young woman who comes from a family of scarce resources; they are farmers affected by violence who have gradually been striving to get ahead despite their adversities.  Senaida dreamed with being able to study a university career but due to her not having the resources to pay for it decided to start her business selling personal use items via catalogue to generate income that would make a university education possible.

Senaida has always wanted to get ahead and in the future be able to offer her parents a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities which is why they strive in their businesses and in their studies to move them forward.  

She offers a wide variety of products to her customers who are mainly her friends, neighbors and classmates.  They have guaranteed good sales for her however she wants to offer a larger variety so that her income will increase considerably.  This is why Senaida is looking for a loan that will make it possible for her to purchase personal use items to increase variety of products she has to offer customers.

Senaida hopes that her income will increase considerably this way because her customers will find more variety of products available in her business to meet their needs.  Besides, Senaida hopes that with higher income her parents will be able to enjoy a better quality of life and greater economic opportunities.

Senaida dreams with completing her studies and getting a well-paid job to alternate with her business thus offering her parents tranquility and economic stability so that they can rest from all the work they’ve done.

loans.use: to buy personal use items.

loans.name: Eman

texts.en:
Eman is a conservative person and she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet, thus the woman in the photo is her daughter, Mays.

Eman is a 45-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of  four children.

Eman is looking to improve her family's living conditions, thus she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to do maintenance on her house.

loans.use: to do maintenance on her house

loans.name: Aida

texts.en:
Aida is a conservative person and she is unwilling to upload her picture on the internet. The man in the photo is her son.

Aida is a 56-year-old married woman from Al Hashmi, Amman, Jordan and a mother of five children. She is a hard-working micro entrepreneur. She works from her home to insure her family better living conditions. She sells cosmetic products and she is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase more quantities.

Aida is looking to purchase a house instead of her current rented one.

loans.use: to purchase more quantities of cosmetic products for her business

loans.name: San

texts.en:
San, 48, has been married and lives in Dongkor commune, Phnom Penh city. She earns a living by owning and operating a general store with many types of merchandise from a booth at her house. She has a life partner and has two children attending school. She typically earns approximately USD $6 each day through this business.

San turned to HKL for her fourth loan to renovate her present house; with the remaining funds, she will buy a stock of merchandise to make a stable business and further improve it. She wants to have a larger store and sell more products to satisfy the local people in her neighborhood. This loan particularly provides her family with great help and a well-needed result in the future.

loans.use: to renovate her present house and buy a stock of merchandise.

loans.name: Thareer

texts.en:
Thareer is a 43-year-old woman from Al Russeifeh, Jordan.

Thareer sells blankets and she is working from her home with an aspiration of moving her business out of her home.

Thareer is requesting a loan of 500 JD to purchase more blankets for business purposes.

loans.use: to purchase more blankets for her business

loans.name: Nay

texts.en:
Nay is 32 years old and is a conscientious and responsible mother of two school-age children. She permanently lives in Ang Snoul district of Kandal province. She works for a local garment factory located in her community. She works six days per week from Monday to Saturday. Her daily work schedule is from 7am to 5pm, but sometimes she has to work overtime as required by the employers.

She normally receives her salary of approximately 90 USD monthly. Another source of the family’s income is from her husband who is a construction foreman. Nay wishes to upgrade her living status someday, so she plans to start another business, which will be run by her husband. That business is to provide daily transportation service to particular groups of garment factory workers. 

Nay decided to ask for a loan from HKL, a longstanding Kiva partner, to purchase a Tuk Tuk, a used motorcycle that comes with a trailer at the back, for her husband. She is very happy and hopes that her family’s household income will increase.

loans.use: to purchase a used motorcycle that comes with a trailer at the back

loans.name: Kateryna

texts.en:
Kateryna is married and has three grown-up children. She works at a plant. Her average income is 2,300 UAH per month. 

Kateryna would like to purchase furniture for her apartment. This will allow her to improve her family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to pay for new furniture.

loans.name: Yeimi Del Carmen

texts.es:
Yeimi es una joven emprendedora que a pesar de su corta edad ya es propietaria de su propio negocio y ya ha formado una familia que siempre le acompaña. Yeimi tiene 20 años de edad, se encuentra casada y tiene un hijo de 3 años quien siempre ha sido su motivación para trabajar fuertemente en su negocio. Desde muy temprana edad Yeimi comenzó a trabajar en tiendas de abarrotes, pues su familia ha tenido este tipo de negocios y de allí adquirió la experiencia. Un día tomó la decisión y montó su propia tienda general donde ofrece toda clase de productos de la canasta familiar, y gracias a esto contribuye económicamente con los ingresos de su hogar. Debido a que su tienda la montó con muy bajo capital, Yeimi no cuenta con un refrigerador y por tanto no puede ofrecer a sus clientes los productos que requieran estar refrigerados constantemente. Es por esto que Yeimi busca que un préstamo le brinde la posibilidad de acceder a la compra de un refrigerador y productos que requieran estar refrigerados para aumentar la variedad de productos que ofrece a sus clientes.

Yeimi espera que de esta manera sus clientes encuentren más atractiva su tienda, y por ende sus ventas aumenten considerablemente. Además, Yeimi espera que con mayores ingresos su familia pueda gozar de una mejor calidad de vida. Yeimi tiene el sueño de tener una gran distribuidora de abarrotes donde pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas.
texts.en:
Yeimi is an entrepreneur who despite her young age already owns her business and has formed a family that’s always by her side.  Yeimi is 20 years old, married and has a three year old son who has always been her motivation to work hard in her business.  From a very young age, Yeimi started working in grocery stores because her family has had that type of business and she acquired experience there.  

One day she decided to open her own general store where she sells basic staple items and thanks to this she contributes economically to her home’s income.  Because she set up the store with very little capital, Yeimi does not have a refrigerator so she can’t offer her customers products that need to be kept under constant refrigeration.  Because of this, Yeimi is looking for a loan to be able to buy a refrigerator and the products that need refrigeration to increase the variety of items she offers her customers.

Yeimi hopes that in this way her customers will find her store still more attractive thus increasing her sales considerably.  Also, Yeimi hopes that with higher income her family will be able to enjoy a better quality of life.  Yeimi dreams with having a large grocery distributorship where she can generate employment for people most in need.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator and products that need to be refrigerated.

loans.name: Otoniel Jose De La Cruz

texts.es:
Otoniel proviene de una familia con escasos recursos económicos, y por esta razón se encuentra trabajando desde que tenía 8 años de edad, con el ánimo de poder contribuir de alguna manera con los ingresos de su hogar. Aprendió la actividad de lustrabotas desde muy temprana edad y gracias a esto empezó a conseguir ingresos con los cuales pueda sostener sus gastos. Posteriormente se vio en la obligación de dejar su ciudad natal y establecer su negocio en otra ciudad, sin embargo, los malos resultados lo obligaron a regresar a su ciudad.
Actualmente Otoniel se encuentra separado y vive con su único hijo en una casa arrendada. Diariamente se esfuerza trabajando en su negocio para sacar su hijo adelante. Otoniel se dedica a la actividad de lustrabotas y además de esto tiene una choza donde ofrece dulces, café y otros productos más. Con el ánimo de surtir su negocio, Otoniel busca que un préstamo le brinde la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos para su lustrabotas como betún, grasas, cepillos, shampoo, entre otros, y productos para su choza de dulces y café. 

Otoniel espera que sus clientes encuentren más necesidades satisfechas en su negocio y de esta manera sus ventas aumenten considerablemente. Además, Otoniel sueña con tener un gran negocio el cual le permita conseguir su casa propia y con el cual pueda sacar su hijo adelante.
texts.en:
Otoniel comes from a family of scarce financial resources.  That is why he has been working since he was eight years old.  His intention was to be able to contribute in some way to the household income.

He learned the business activity of shining shoes at a very early age.  Thanks to this he started to get income with which he could pay his expenses.  Later, he was compelled to leave his native city and establish his business in another city.  However, his poor results obligated him to return to his native city. 

Otoniel is currently separated, and he lives with his only son in a rented house.  He works hard every day in his business in order to get his son ahead.  Otoniel devotes himself to the business activity of shining shoes.  He also has a hut where he sells sweets, coffee, and other products.

With the intention of stocking his business, Otoniel looks to a loan.  The loan will give him the opportunity to buy products for shining shoes like shoe polish, shoe cream, brushes, and shampoo, among others.  He will also buy sweets and coffee for his hut.

Otoniel hopes that his customers find more of their needs met in his business.  This way his sales will increase considerably.  Also, Otoniel dreams of having a big business, which will allow him to get his own house.  With the house he will be able to get his son ahead.

loans.use: to buy to buy products for shining shoes like shoe polish, shoe cream, brushes, and shampoo, among others.  He will also buy sweets and coffee for his hut.
